info.title: Infrashop Feed engine API
info.description: In this API documentation, you will get to know infrashop feed engine. Using API operations defined here you will be able to retrieve up to date information about key data like product, order, price, stock, payment and order status.

get.description:
Retrieve all pending product updates. This API operation will return all changes that are pending integration. Each entry has an UUID that has to be acknowledged in order to be dequeued. Use DELETE HTTP operation to ACK on these entries after retrieving them.
This API will return an empty array when there are no pending entries.

Required Functionalities

Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Consultar
Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Consultar - Canal de Vendas

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to retrieve. If not provided, a default value is used.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You are not authorized to retrieve product feed information. Please check error messages.

delete.summary: ACK a list of product feed entries.
delete.description:
This API operation allows you to acknowledge a list of product feed entries. After acknowledging a product feed entry, you are stating that this entry was successfuly received and can be removed from pending entries list.

Required Functionalities

Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Gravar
Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Gravar - Canal de Vendas

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Array containing a list of product feed IDs to acknowledge.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You cannot ACK this product feed list. Please check error messages.

404.description: Product feed ID not found. Please check error messages.

get.summary: Retrieve products from feed engine by last update date.
get.description:
Retrieve all products in feed engine that were updated after the date you provided.

Required Functionalities

Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Consultar
Acessos - Parametros Feed Engine - Consultar - Canal de Vendas

parameters.name: updateDt
parameters.description: Date that will be used to query for products. All orders update after this date will be returned. Date format is YYYY-MM-DD'T'HH24:MI:SSTZ. Ex: 1970-01-01T00:00:00-0300

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Authentication token provided by auth API, like "Bearer 926c6e54-df23-4da4-be38-b002f0454720"

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Starts with 0.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Page size. Cannot be higher than 20.

401.description: Please provide a valid authentication token.

403.description: You are not authorized to retrieve product feed information. Please check error messages.

ProductFeed.description: Product feed entry. This entity contains a product and a unique identifier that must be used to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

feedId.description: Feed unique identifier. Use this to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

SkuFeed.description: Sku feed entry. This entity contains a sku and a unique identifier that must be used to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

id.description: Feed unique identifier. Use this to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

StockFeed.description: Product feed entry. This entity contains a product and a unique identifier that must be used to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

id.description: Feed unique identifier. Use this to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

PriceFeed.description: Product feed entry. This entity contains a product and a unique identifier that must be used to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

id.description: Feed unique identifier. Use this to ACK the retrieval of this entry.

ProductFeedPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. Product entries will be available in "items".

links.description:
Collection of page links. You will find up to 5 links:
  • self - link to this same page
  • first - link to the first page
  • last - link to the last page
  • next - link to the next page. This will be only presented when there is a next page
  • previous - link to the previous page. This will be only presented when there is a previous page

SkuFeedPagination.description: Standard pagination envelope response. Sku entries will be available in "items".
